function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 via contaminated objects and surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of infection from touching contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular sanitization of frequently touched surfaces and objects","Technologies":"Use of disinfectants and UV-C sterilization","People":"General public, healthcare workers, cleaning staff","Owner":"Facility managers, cleaning services, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Uncertainty around viral shedding from asymptomatic carriers","Impact":"Potential for undetected transmission of SARS-CoV-2 from asymptomatic carriers","Mitigation":"Increase testing and monitoring of asymptomatic individuals, public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Enhanced testing protocols, surveillance systems","People":"Public health authorities, medical professionals, general public","Owner":"Public health authorities, medical organizations, government"},{"Description":"High contagiousness of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Rapid and sustained spread of the virus within communities","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing, mask-wearing, and strict hygiene practices","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, ventilation systems, rapid testing","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, employers"}]}
